ヴルーテ・ソース: (ブルテー・ソース) - velouté sauce
ヶ: (ケ) - (read as "ka")  counter for the ichi-ni-san counting system (usu. directly preceding the item being counted)/noun read using its on-yomi; (read as "ko")  counter for articles; (read as "ga")  indicates possessive (esp. in place names)
ヶ所: (かしょ) - (esp. か所, etc. when a counter) passage; place; point; part
・: (なかぐろ) - middle dot (typographical symbol used between parallel terms, names in katakana, etc.); full-stop mark at mid-character height; interpoint (interword separation)
ー: (ー) - (known as ちょうおん) long vowel mark (usually only used in katakana)
ヽ: (くりかえし) - repetition mark in katakana
ヾ: (くりかえし) - voiced repetition mark in katakana
一: (um/algum/pessoa) - um, um; melhor; em primeiro lugar; começo, começar
一々: (いちいち) - one-by-one/separately; every single/each and every/without omission/fully/in detail
一から: (いちから) - from the beginning; from scratch
一からやり直す: (いちからやりなおす) - to sweep the slate clean; to start again from the beginning; to do it all over again
一から十まで: (いちからじゅうまで) - from A to Z; without exception; in every particular
一から十迄: (いちからじゅうまで) - from A to Z; without exception; in every particular
一か八か: (いちかばちか) - sink or swim; high-stakes; desperate
一か所: (いっかしょ) - one place; the same place
一きわ: (ひときわ) - conspicuously; noticeably; remarkably; still more; especially
一くさり: (ひとくさり) - passage in a discourse; one section; one scene
一こま: (ひとこま) - one scene/one frame/one shot/one exposure; one cell/one panel (comic)
一ころ: (いちころ) - trouncing; beating somebody hands down
一しきり: (ひとしきり) - for a while; for some time; for a period
一しょ: (いっしょ) - together; at the same time; same/identical
一すじ: (ひとすじ) - one long straight object (e.g. strand of hair, beam of light, wisp of smoke); a single bloodline; earnest/resolute/intent/devoted; ordinary/common
一たび: (ひとたび) - once/one time/on one occasion; (ひとたび only) temporarily/for a moment; (いちど only) one degree/one tone/one musical interval
一っ走り: (ひとっぱしり) - spin (as in 'take a car for a spin'); run
一っ飛び: (ひとっとび) - one jump/one flight; (at) once/(in) one stroke
一つ: (hitotsu) - um; por um lado, um; por um lado; apenas; (nem) mesmo
一つずつ: (ひとつずつ) - one by one; one each; one at a time
一つづつ: (ひとつづつ) - one by one; one each; one at a time
一つとっても: (ひとつとっても) - one example of (when there are more examples)
一つにかかって: (ひとつにかかって) - depends entirely on; depends above all on
一つに掛かって: (ひとつにかかって) - depends entirely on; depends above all on
一つひとつ: (ひとつひとつ) - one-by-one; separately; in detail
一つ一つ: (ひとつひとつ) - one-by-one; separately; in detail
一つ二つ: (ひとつふたつ) - one or two; a few; small number
一つ家: (ひとつや) - one house/the same house; detached house
一つ度も: (ひとつども) - (with negative predicate) not even once, never
一つ心: (ひとつこころ) - one mind; the whole heart; wholeheartedness
一つ星: (ひとつぼし) - evening star; morning star
一つ書き: (ひとつがき) - an item; itemization; itemisation
一つ目: (ひとつめ) - one-eyed; first (in a series)/initial
一つ目小僧: (ひとつめこぞう) - one-eyed goblin; one-eyed monster
一つ穴: (ひとつあな) - same hole (in which to live); gang/group
一つ穴のむじな: (ひとつあなのむじな) - gang; group
一つ穴の狢: (ひとつあなのむじな) - gang; group
一つ穴の貉: (ひとつあなのむじな) - gang; group
一つ置き: (ひとつおき) - alternate; every other one
一つ葉たご: (ヒトツバタゴ) - Chinese fringe tree (Chionanthus retusus)
一つ葉田子: (ヒトツバタゴ) - Chinese fringe tree (Chionanthus retusus)
一つ覚え: (ひとつおぼえ) - the one thing that is well-remembered
一つ話: (ひとつばなし) - anecdote; common talk
一つ返事: (ひとつへんじ) - (common mistake for 二つ返事)  ready reply; quick answer
一つ釜: (ひとつかま) - one or the same pot; eating or living together
一とたび: (ひとたび) - once/one time/on one occasion; (ひとたび only) temporarily/for a moment; (いちど only) one degree/one tone/one musical interval
一にかかって: (いちにかかって) - depends entirely on; depends above all on
一にも二にも: (いちにもににも) - above all else
一に掛かって: (ひとつにかかって) - depends entirely on; depends above all on
一の字点: (いちのじてん) - kana iteration mark
一の宮: (いちのみや) - first-born imperial prince; most important provincial shrine
一の松: (いちのまつ) - closest pine-tree to a noh stage (of the three placed in front of the bridge walkway)
一の糸: (いちのいと) - first string (of a shamisen, etc.)
一の膳: (いちのぜん) - 1st course at a banquet
一の酉: (いちのとり) - first day of the cock in the eleventh month
一の鳥居: (いちのとりい) - first torii gate of a shrine
一まず: (ひとまず) - for the present; once; in outline
一わたり: (ひとわたり) - briefly; in general; roughly; from beginning to end; through (e.g. glancing, flipping)
一を聞いて十を知る: (いちをきいてじゅうをしる) - to understand everything from only one part; to be perceptive
一ケ所: (いっかしょ) - one place; the same place
一コマ: (ひとコマ) - one scene/one frame/one shot/one exposure; one cell/one panel (comic)
一タ偏: (いちたへん) - kanji "bare bone" radical at left
一リットル炊き: (いちリットルだき) - having a cooking capacity of one liter
一ヶ所: (いっかしょ) - one place; the same place
一一: (いちいち) - one-by-one/separately; every single/each and every/without omission/fully/in detail
一一〇番: (ひゃくとおばん) - police emergency tel. no. (in Japan)
一一九番: (ひゃくじゅうきゅうばん) - ambulance and fire brigade emergency tel. no. (in Japan)
一丁: (いっちょう) - one sheet/one page/one leaf; one block of tofu/one serving (in a restaurant); (also written as 一挺, 一梃) one long and narrow thing (e.g. guns, scissors, spades, hoes, inksticks, palanquins, candles, jinrikishas, shamisen, oars, etc.); one cho (unit of distance, 109.09 m); one game/one task; well then/come then
一丁前: (いっちょまえ) - becoming an adult or full-fledged member of (a) society
一丁字: (いっちょうじ) - single letter or character
